ermintrude.body:
I am well and truly
borked and 
twazzled

foo.label: National Insurance number
foo.hint:
It's on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60.
For example, 'VO 12 34 56 D'.

housing-act.label: Which part of the Housing Act was your licence isued under?

housing-act-part-2.label: Part 2 of the Housing Act 2004
housing-act-part-2.sublabel: For properties that are 3 or more stories high and occupied by 5 or more people

housing-act-part-3.label: Part 3 of the Housing Act 2004
housing-act-part-3.sublabel: For properties that are within a geographical area defined by a local council

route.bar.title: Bar page title
route.bar.heading: Bar page heading
route.bar.lede: Some old ledeish text to fill in the gap

entrypoint-copy.body: You don’t have to answer every question but the more information you provide, the more helpful your plan will be. We won’t save any of your details unless you say we can.

route:action_plan.title: Get started
route:action_plan.heading: Personalised Action Plan
route:action_plan.lede: Your personalised action plan will outline ways that may help you reach an agreement with your child’s other parent about child arrangements.

route:staying_safe.heading: Staying safe
route:staying_safe.lede: Thinking about your situation with your child’s other parent:

route:you_and_other_parent.heading: You and your {children_number, plural, =1 {child} other {children}}’s other parent

child_safety.label: Are you worried about your child’s safety?

your_safety.label: Are you worried about your child’s safety?

child_flight.label: Is your child at risk of being taken out of the country?

children_number.label: How many children are you trying to make arrangements for?

child_live_with_applicant.label: Do the children live with you most of the time?

child_not_seeing_parent.label: Are you having disagreements about access that mean your children aren’t seeing both parents currently?

child_have_a_say.label: Would you like your children to have a say in any agreements you make?

child_additional_support.label: Would you like information about additional help and support to help your children to cope with your separation?

arrangements_how_long.label: How long have you been trying to make child arrangements?

relationship_status.label: How is the relationship between you both now?

communicating_about_arrangements_status.label: How do you usually find communicating about child arrangements with each other?

communicating_methods.label: How do you communicate with each other?

parent_official_org_engagement.label: Would you like information about how an official organisation could help to get the other parent to engage with making child arrangements?

childcare_disagreements.label: Do you disagree with your child’s other parent over medical treatment, religious activities and/or schooling?

parental_rights_info.label: Would you like information about your legal rights and responsibilities as a parent?

options_tried.label: Options tried
options_tried.sublabel: Tick anything that you have already tried to help agree your arrangements

options_tried_written_agreement.label: Made a written agreement with your ex-partner

options_tried_leader.label: Talked to religious or community leader

options_tried_other_value.label: What other method did you try?

english_not_first_language.label: Do you struggle to understand English and need a translator to help you make child arrangements?
